name: LuvSic
description:
Overview


In this game whose story lasts about 2 hours, you will act as an ordinary girl who had graduated for three years and now is unemployed because of the economic downturn caused by the emergency. Struggled in a personal financial crisis, she is confused about her life.

One day you accepted a special job: make friends with girls living on this street, then open their hearts to tell you their love stories. You will get paid for the writing of these stories.

But as you dig out more about their stories, you will realize that the connections among people in this city are surprisingly close…

Features


  • The fascinating plots.

  • A game stage where you can explore the story freely.

  • 9 urban girls with different personalities and unknown secrets are waiting for you to discover.

  • Numerous vivid Character animations.
